csseaMember.status: We are a member of the Community Social Services Employers' Association (CSSEA).

fundingModel.provinciallyFunded: All of our facilities have provincially funded ECEs and receive Low-Wage Redress Funding.
fundingModel.nonProvinciallyFunded: All of our facilities have only non-provincially funded ECEs and do not receive Low-Wage Redress Funding.
fundingModel.mixedFunding: Our facilities have both provincially funded ECEs receiving Low -Wage Redress Funding and non -provincially funded ECEs that do not receive Low - Wage Redress Funding.

csseaNonMember.status: We are not a member of the Community Social Services Employers' Association (CSSEA).

response.noneUnionized: None of our facilities are unionized.
response.someOrAllUnionized: Some or all of our facilities are unionized.

cssea.confirmation: I confirm our organization/facilities has reached a local agreement with the union to amend the collective agreement(s) in order to implement the ECE-WE.
